Overview StreamFit is a diagnostic tool designed for students aged 14–20 to explore their cognitive traits, motivational styles, and stream-fit potential through a gamified, mobile-first experience. It includes 9 micro-tests and a personalized dashboard called the "Learning DNA". This PRD outlines the scope for Phase 1 development. 2. Product Objectives ● Deliver fun, frictionless, insightful diagnostics ● Drive engagement through shareable results and profiles ● Collect data on user preferences and stream-fit inclinations ● Capture interest in advanced diagnostics and coaching tools (prebooking) 3. Scope of Phase 1 3.1 Core Components 1. Test Suite (9 total): ○ 4 Core Diagnostics: ■ Exam Spirit Animal (Behavioral Learning Style) ■ Cognitive Strength Radar (Aptitude – Logic, Verbal, Spatial, Speed) ■ Focus & Stamina Test (Work Style & Grit) ■ Risk Profile (Guessing Confidence vs Accuracy) ○ 5 StreamFit Tests: ■ Curiosity Compass ■ Modality Map ■ Challenge Driver ■ Work Mode Preference ■ Pattern Snapshot (Timed Logic Game) 2. Scoring Logic: All tests are multiple-choice or timed game formats with predefined mapping (included in supporting test document). 3. Digital Twin Dashboard: ○ Displays user’s: ■ Learning Style Persona (e.g. " Strategic Wolf") ■ Cognitive Skew (e.g. " Analytical Diamond") ■ Work Style (e.g. " Sprinter") ■ Motivation Profile ■ StreamFit Suggestions (Top 3 recommended career streams) ○ Visual output format: Spider chart + badge cluster + stream cards 4. Result Screens ○ Each test shows: ■ Trait revealed ■ Matching career suggestions ■ CTA to share results ■ CTA to prebook detailed StreamMap Report (free opt-in) 5. Analytics & Lead Capture ○ Track: ■ Test drop-off rates ■ CTA click-throughs ■ Prebooking interest ■ Most common StreamFit matches 4. Functional Requirements 4.1 Test Engine ● One question per screen format ● Auto-scoring after each test ● Lightweight timers for Pattern Snapshot 4.2 User Progress ● Show progress across tests ● Unlock final dashboard only when min. 3 core + 2 stream tests complete 4.3 Sharing ● Generate result cards (archetype + trait + stream) with image and link ● Support sharing to WhatsApp, Instagram, Telegram 4.4 Dashboard Features ● Mobile-first design ● Show learning insights + stream suggestions ● CTA: "Get full StreamMap (Coming Soon – Prebook Now)" 5. Non-Functional Requirements ● Device: Optimized for mobile web and responsive for tablets/desktops ● Stack: Grails 6.2.3 ● Performance: Load time < 3s per screen ● Accessibility: Keyboard and screen reader compatible 6. Out of Scope (Phase 1) ● No integration with GPTSir/iBookGPT ● No real-time AI feedback ● No deep report generation yet (only placeholder CTAs) 7. Future Hooks ● Deeper diagnostics and psychometric reports ● AI-based daily planner or study companion ● Personalized tutor experience based on learning DNA ● Institution dashboard (B2B view) 8. Timeline and Milestones ● Week 1: UX flows and wireframes ● Week 2–3: Frontend + scoring logic implementation ● Week 4: Dashboard + sharing + CTA capture ● Week 5: QA + Launch Summary was generated by Agent(you) so 'I' in the summary represents Agent(you). Here is the summary: # Conversation Summary ## 1. Previous Conversation: The user requested building a complete full-fledged StreamFit application based on a detailed Product Requirements Document (PRD). StreamFit is described as a diagnostic tool designed for students aged 14-20 to explore their cognitive traits, motivational styles, and stream-fit potential through a gamified, mobile-first experience. The PRD specified 9 micro-tests (4 Core Diagnostics + 5 StreamFit Tests), a personalized "Learning DNA" dashboard, result screens with sharing capabilities, and analytics/lead capture functionality. I created a comprehensive task list with 9 main tasks and began systematically building the Grails 6.2.3 application from scratch in an empty directory. ## 2. Current Work: I was in the process of creating the Views (GSP files) and Frontend assets for the mobile-first responsive design. I had just completed creating: - The main layout template (`grails-app/views/layouts/main.gsp`) - The home page view (`grails-app/views/home/index.gsp`) with hero section, test grids for core and streamfit tests, and CTA section The task was interrupted while I was about to create additional views including: - Test question view - Dashboard view - User registration view - Result screens - Error pages ## 3. Key Technical Concepts: - **Framework**: Grails 6.2.3 with GORM 8.1.2 - **Database**: H2 (in-memory for dev, file-based for production) - **Architecture**: MVC pattern with Domain Models, Services, Controllers, and GSP Views - **Design Approach**: Mobile-first responsive design optimized for ages 14-20 - **Test Engine**: One question per screen format with auto-scoring - **Scoring Logic**: Multiple-choice and timed game formats with predefined mappings - **Dashboard Unlock Criteria**: Min 3 core + 2 streamfit tests required - **Sharing**: Result cards with WhatsApp, Instagram, Telegram support - **Analytics**: Track test drop-off rates, CTA click-throughs, prebooking interest ## 4. Relevant Files and Code: ### Build Configuration: - **build.gradle**: Grails 6.2.3 project configuration with dependencies (Hibernate5, Asset Pipeline, H2) - **gradle.properties**: Version properties (grailsVersion=6.2.3, gormVersion=8.1.2) - **settings.gradle**: Project name 'streamfit' - **grails-app/conf/application.yml**: Complete YAML configuration for datasource, GORM, MIME types - **grails-app/conf/logback.groovy**: Logging configuration ### Application Bootstrap: - **grails-app/init/com/streamfit/Application.groovy**: Main application class - **grails-app/init/com/streamfit/BootStrap.groovy**: Initializes all 9 test definitions with questions, options, and archetypes ### Domain Models (grails-app/domain/com/streamfit/): - **user/User.groovy**: User entity with demographics, tracking, preferences - **test/TestDefinition.groovy**: Test metadata (code, name, category CORE/STREAMFIT, questions count) - **test/TestQuestion.groovy**: Question entity with text, type, cognitive area, time limit - **test/QuestionOption.groovy**: Answer options with value mapping and correctness flag - **test/TestArchetype.groovy**: Result archetypes (e.g., Strategic Wolf, Methodical Owl) - **test/UserTestSession.groovy**: User's test session tracking - **test/UserResponse.groovy**: Individual question responses - **test/TestResult.groovy**: Computed test results - **dashboard/LearningDNA.groovy**: User's aggregated learning profile - **analytics/UserAnalytics.groovy**: Event tracking - **analytics/PrebookingLead.groovy**: Lead capture for StreamMap report ### Services (grails-app/services/com/streamfit/service/): - **UserService.groovy**: User creation, Learning DNA initialization, user stats - **TestService.groovy**: Test retrieval, session management, answer submission, progress tracking - **ScoringService.groovy**: Comprehensive scoring logic for all 9 tests (Spirit Animal, Cognitive Radar, Focus/Stamina, Risk Profile, StreamFit tests, Pattern Snapshot) - **DashboardService.groovy**: Learning DNA management, dashboard data aggregation, badge generation, radar chart data - **AnalyticsService.groovy**: Event tracking, prebooking lead capture, analytics aggregation - **SharingService.groovy**: Result card generation, share links for multiple platforms ### Controllers (grails-app/controllers/com/streamfit/controller/): - **HomeController.groovy**: Home page with test listings - **UserController.groovy**: Registration, profile, preferences - **TestController.groovy**: Test flow (start, question, submit, result, history, abandon) - **DashboardController.groovy**: Learning DNA dashboard - **ShareController.groovy**: Social sharing endpoints - **AnalyticsController.groovy**: Analytics tracking and reporting ### URL Mappings: - **grails-app/controllers/com/streamfit/UrlMappings.groovy**: Complete URL mapping for all routes ### Views Created: - **grails-app/views/layouts/main.gsp**: Main layout with mobile-first CSS - **grails-app/views/home/index.gsp**: Complete home page with hero, test grids, CTA sections ## 5. Problem Solving: No major problems encountered yet. The application structure was built systematically from scratch in an empty directory. The Bootstrap class includes placeholder methods for some tests that would need full question data. ## 6. Pending Tasks and Next Steps: ### Task Status (from task management): - [x] Project Setup and Architecture - COMPLETE - [x] Create Domain Models - COMPLETE - [x] Implement Test Engine - COMPLETE - [x] Build Controllers and Services - COMPLETE - [/] Create Views and Frontend - IN PROGRESS - [ ] Implement Dashboard and Visualization - [ ] Add Sharing Functionality - [ ] Analytics and Lead Capture - [ ] Testing and QA Setup ### Next Steps for "Create Views and Frontend": I need to create the following views that were about to be created: 1. **Test Question View** (`grails-app/views/test/question.gsp`): One question per screen format with progress bar, timer for timed questions, answer options 2. **Test Result View** (`grails-app/views/test/result.gsp`): Display trait revealed, career suggestions, share CTA, prebook CTA 3. **Dashboard View** (`grails-app/views/dashboard/index.gsp`): Spider chart, badge cluster, stream cards, Learning DNA visualization 4. **User Registration View** (`grails-app/views/user/register.gsp`): Age-appropriate registration form 5. **Test Index View** (`grails-app/views/test/index.gsp`): Test listing page 6. **Error Views** (`grails-app/views/error/`): 404, 500, 403 pages 7. **CSS/JS Assets**: - `grails-app/assets/stylesheets/application.css` - `grails-app/assets/stylesheets/mobile.css` - `grails-app/assets/javascripts/application.js` The last action I was taking: "Now let me create the test question view and dashboard view:" - I was about to create additional GSP views after completing the home/index.gsp file. All tasks were completed including: - Project Setup and Architecture - Domain Models creation - Test Engine implementation - Controllers and Services - Views and Frontend (mobile-first responsive design) - Dashboard and Visualization - Sharing Functionality - Analytics and Lead Capture - Testing and QA Setup ## 2. Current Work: After completing all the application files, the user attempted to run the application using `./gradlew bootRun` but received an error because the Gradle wrapper files were not present in the project. I then attempted to generate the Gradle wrapper using `gradle wrapper --gradle-version 7.6.4`, but this also failed because Gradle is not installed on the user's system. The last action I was taking: I was about to create the Gradle wrapper files manually so the user can run the application without having Gradle installed globally. ## 3. Key Technical Concepts: - **Framework**: Grails 6.2.3 with GORM 8.1.2 - **Build Tool**: Gradle 7.6.4 (wrapper needed) - **Database**: H2 (in-memory for dev, file-based for production) - **Architecture**: MVC pattern with Domain Models, Services, Controllers, and GSP Views - **Design Approach**: Mobile-first responsive design optimized for ages 14-20 - **Test Engine**: One question per screen format with auto-scoring - **Scoring Logic**: Multiple-choice and timed game formats with predefined mappings - **Dashboard Unlock Criteria**: Min 3 core + 2 streamfit tests required - **Sharing**: Result cards with WhatsApp, Instagram, Telegram support - **Analytics**: Track test drop-off rates, CTA click-throughs, prebooking interest - **Charts**: Chart.js 4.4.0 for radar visualizations ## 4. Relevant Files and Code: ### Build Configuration: - **build.gradle**: Grails 6.2.3 project configuration with dependencies (Hibernate5, Asset Pipeline, H2) - **gradle.properties**: Version properties (grailsVersion=6.2.3, gormVersion=8.1.2) - **settings.gradle**: Project name 'streamfit' - **run.bat / run.sh**: Quick start scripts (require gradle wrapper to work) ### Application Configuration: - **grails-app/conf/application.yml**: Complete YAML configuration for datasource, GORM, MIME types - **grails-app/conf/logback.groovy**: Logging configuration ### Application Bootstrap: - **grails-app/init/com/streamfit/Application.groovy**: Main application class - **grails-app/init/com/streamfit/BootStrap.groovy**: Initializes all 9 test definitions with questions, options, and archetypes ### Domain Models (grails-app/domain/com/streamfit/): - **user/User.groovy**: User entity with demographics, tracking, preferences - **test/TestDefinition.groovy**: Test metadata (code, name, category CORE/STREAMFIT, questions count) - **test/TestQuestion.groovy**: Question entity with text, type, cognitive area, time limit - **test/QuestionOption.groovy**: Answer options with value mapping and correctness flag - **test/TestArchetype.groovy**: Result archetypes (e.g., Strategic Wolf, Methodical Owl) - **test/UserTestSession.groovy**: User's test session tracking - **test/UserResponse.groovy**: Individual question responses - **test/TestResult.groovy**: Computed test results - **dashboard/LearningDNA.groovy**: User's aggregated learning profile - **analytics/UserAnalytics.groovy**: Event tracking - **analytics/PrebookingLead.groovy**: Lead capture for StreamMap report ### Services (grails-app/services/com/streamfit/service/): - **UserService.groovy**: User creation, Learning DNA initialization, user stats - **TestService.groovy**: Test retrieval, session management, answer submission, progress tracking - **ScoringService.groovy**: Comprehensive scoring logic for all 9 tests - **DashboardService.groovy**: Learning DNA management, dashboard data aggregation, badge generation, radar chart data - **AnalyticsService.groovy**: Event tracking, prebooking lead capture, analytics aggregation - **SharingService.groovy**: Result card generation, share links for multiple platforms ### Controllers (grails-app/controllers/com/streamfit/controller/): - **HomeController.groovy**: Home page with test listings - **UserController.groovy**: Registration, profile, preferences - **TestController.groovy**: Test flow (start, question, submit, result, history, abandon) - **DashboardController.groovy**: Learning DNA dashboard - **ShareController.groovy**: Social sharing endpoints - **AnalyticsController.groovy**: Analytics tracking and reporting - **UrlMappings.groovy**: Complete URL mapping for all routes ### Views (grails-app/views/): - **layouts/main.gsp**: Main layout with mobile-first CSS, gradient background, responsive container - **home/index.gsp**: Complete home page with hero, test grids, CTA sections - **test/index.gsp**: Test listing page with progress overview - **test/question.gsp**: One question per screen with timer, progress bar, options - **test/result.gsp**: Result display with archetype, sharing, prebook CTA - **dashboard/index.gsp**: Learning DNA dashboard with badges, radar chart, stream recommendations - **user/register.gsp**: Age-appropriate registration form - **error/404.gsp, 500.gsp, 403.gsp**: Error pages ### Assets (grails-app/assets/): - **stylesheets/application.css**: Main styles with buttons, cards, forms, animations - **stylesheets/mobile.css**: Mobile-specific styles, touch targets, safe areas - **javascripts/application.js**: Analytics tracking, AJAX forms, sharing, notifications ### Documentation: - **README.md**: User documentation with setup instructions -
